course_title: Seminar in Performance Practices - STR-PIAN PRF PRC

sections.comments: Seminar in Performance Practices: Strings and Piano  Sonatas, Trios, Quartets, Quintets.  All students will attend the weekly two-hour lecture (Tuesdays) and one-hour coaching section (Mondays and Wednesdays).  MUSC 521D is required for incoming MMus students in string and piano Performance, and is also open as an elective to any grad string and piano performance major.  Those who have taken the 521 Sonata course may enroll in this course.  Undergraduate 3rd and 4th year Strings or Piano performance majors may enroll in undergraduate section MUSC 403A. GMUS (Strings and Piano) students should contact instructor for permission to register.

description: Studies in the theoretical and practical problems of musical interpretation.
